channel.title: enxgmatic's hidey hole
channel.description: Recent content on enxgmatic's hidey hole

item.title: Whitehacks 2024 - The Swiftie Waitlist [Pwn Writeup]
item.description: Whitehacks 2024 - The Swiftie Waitlist [Pwn Writeup] Description Solves: 2 To deal with the overwhelming demand for the recent Swiftie concert, a waitlist system was enacted to handle the overcapacity problem. However, it’s been made aware that the program was vulnerable, and some fanatic fans have even exploited it to skip the waitlist entirely. Just how did they do it? By GovTech nc ctf2.whitehats.site 2005 Initial Analysis $ ./checksec waitlist Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: Full RELRO Stack: Canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: PIE enabled ------ $ .

item.title: Secret Keyword
item.description: Huehuehue, here’s the second part of the secret keyword: **REDACTED** Actually, I’m editing the post to redact the secret to prevent certain people from accessing it. If only there was a way for you to go back in time to access the older version of this post… huehuehue.

item.title: Pwntools Cheatsheet
item.description: This is a very brief cheatsheet and introduction to pwntools for CTFs. I am writing this specifically for Sieberrsec CTF 5.0, but it can be applied for all CTFs. Install and Import pip install pwntools: to install pwntools, use this command in the terminal from pwn import *: put this at the top of your python file to import pwntools. Making connections r = remote(HOST, PORT): connects to a remote connection, with the relevant host and port

item.title: Hack@AC 2024
item.description: Hack@AC 2024 I took part in Hack@AC 2024 with the team à¶žà¶žà¶žà¶ž. We attained 4th place in the tertiary category, having the same score as 3rd place, simply submitting the last flag later than them :( Additionally, I won the first blood prize for solving the challenge web/Libwary. ðŸ©¸ web/Fruit Color Query One of the more interesting sql injection challenges. Reconnaissance Going to the website and using the sample apple picture provided, it seems that it outputs the colour of the fruit.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m enxgmatic, a Singaporean student trying to get better at cybersecurity and life.
